solution_line_template: The price of the bicycle increased by ${original_price} * {increase_percentage} = ${price_increase_amount}<<{original_price}*{increase_percentage}={price_increase_amount}>>{price_increase_amount}.
Adding the increment price, the new price is ${original_price} + ${price_increase_amount} = ${new_price}<<{original_price}+{price_increase_amount}={new_price}>>{new_price}.
